name: Sir Jenzman's Flawless Plan
description:
Princess Qurt has been kidnapped by the villanous Dr. Joergen! It's up to our hero, Sir Jenzman, to save her! But we need to be prepared. As such, we have set up simulations for a variety of circumstances that could affect Sir Jenzman´s success.

Play through 19 different scenarios to find out what will and what won't lead to Sir Jenzman's success! You'll play through each scenario in succession, regardless of which are successes or failures. Try to get as many successes as possible!

Controls: A and D to move. W to jump.

(This game was made for the DM GameJam of November 2021.)
